name: 3 Minutes to Freeze
description:
Ludum Dare 46

Theme: Keep it Alive

You've somehow survived a plane crash and is now stranded in a freezing forest.

Rescue is coming, but you have to keep yourself warm long enough.

The only source of heat? You're own burning plane. Keep its flames alive and MAYBE you'll have enough heat to survive.

CONTROLS

WASD/Arrow keys : movement

Left Click: throw stick on direction of mouse

Escape: Main Menu
